input.sentences: all the fresh sea life that had been caught in the ocean is taken here to the factory .
employees take fresh fish from the shipment | and take it to the butcher .
the butcher cleans the fish | then proceeds to slice open in order to clean out the insides .
once its all clean | it is ready to be consumed by hungry customers .
raw fish is a typical delicacy in location .
output.sentences: Living by the sea is definitely the best ocean life,
There is always fresh fish on their shipments.
You can take time to watch them slice the sea food.
Outside you could see a line of hungry ready to eat costumers.
They are known for their typical raw servings.
